taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section arguti;species defectionis;

treatment.other_name: (of eclipse; from the type-region, eclipse, va.)
treatment.description: Larger than no. 195; canes up to 1.5 dm. high, the floricanes with divergent to horizontal or recurving branches; later primocane-leaves 5-foliolate, glabrate above, with deeply impressed nerves; larger terminal leaflets 5-6.5 cm. long, rounded at base, elliptic-oval to slightly obovate; larger simple blades or terminal leaflets of bracteal leaves 2-3.5 cm. long, narrowly cuneate-obovate or subrhombic; fruit subglobose, 1-1.5 cm. in diameter.
treatment.habitat_elevation_distribution_or_ecolog: Bases of bluffs along James R., Nansemond Co., Va. Fr. June.
